sentence.Network_en: They stuck to their task manfully.
He faced up to his troubles manfully.

entry.def: If you say that someone, especially a man, does something manfully, you mean that they do it in a very determined or brave way.

example.ex: They stuck to their task manfully.
...simple people who manfully bear the deprivations that are their lot.
example.tran: 勇于承受贫苦命运的淳朴的人们

means.word_mean: 1. in a manful manner; with qualities thought to befit a man;

sentences.sentence: "having said her say Peggy manfully shouldered her burden and prepared to break up yet another home"
